Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ca.publisher

Interface PublisherSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PublisherSessionLocal, PublisherSessionRemote
    public interface PublisherSession
    Interface for publisher operations
    Version:
    $Id: PublisherSession.java 30470 2018-11-12 11:02:11Z samuellb $

    • Method Detail

      • getPublisher

        BasePublisher getPublisher​(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - id
        Returns:
        a BasePublisher or null if a publisher with the given id does not exist. Uses cache to get the object as quickly as possible.

      • getPublisher

        BasePublisher getPublisher​(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - name
        Returns:
        a BasePublisher or null if a publisher with the given name does not exist. Uses cache to get the object as quickly as possible.

      • getPublisherName

        String getPublisherName​(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - id
        Returns:
        the name of the publisher with the given id, null if none was found.

      • getPublisherData

        Map<?,​?> getPublisherData​(int id)
                         throws PublisherDoesntExistsException
        Parameters:
        id - id
        Returns:
        the data hashmap of the publisher with the given id.
        Throws:
        PublisherDoesntExistsException - if there's no publisher with the given id.

      • getPublisherIdToNameMap

        HashMap<Integer,​String> getPublisherIdToNameMap()
        Returns:
        mapping of publisher id (Integer) to publisher name (String).

      • getPublisherNameToIdMap

        HashMap<String,​Integer> getPublisherNameToIdMap()
        Returns:
        mapping of publisher name (String) to publisher id (Integer).

      • addPublisher

        void addPublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                  int id,
                  String name,
                  BasePublisher publisher)
           throws PublisherExistsException,
                  AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds a publisher to the database. Used for importing and exporting profiles from xml-files.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of admin.
        id - the publisher is.
        name - the name of the publisher to add.
        publisher - the publisher to add.
        Throws:
        PublisherExistsException - if publisher already exists.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher

      • addPublisherFromData

        void addPublisherFromData​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                          int id,
                          String name,
                          Map<?,​?> data)
                   throws PublisherExistsException,
                          AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds a publisher to the database. Used where it's not possible to pass a BasePublisher object, such as in the CLI tools (e.g. statedump).
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        id - id
        name - name
        data - data
        Throws:
        PublisherExistsException - if publisher already exists.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher

      • addPublisher

        int addPublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                 String name,
                 BasePublisher publisher)
          throws PublisherExistsException,
                 AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds a publisher to the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of admin
        name - the name of the publisher to add.
        publisher - the publisher to add
        Returns:
        the publisher ID as added
        Throws:
        PublisherExistsException - if publisher already exists.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher

      • clonePublisher

        void clonePublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                    String oldname,
                    String newname)
             throws PublisherDoesntExistsException,
                    AuthorizationDeniedException,
                    PublisherExistsException
        Adds a publisher with the same content as the original.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        oldname - name
        newname - name
        Throws:
        PublisherDoesntExistsException - if publisher does not exist
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher
        PublisherExistsException - if publisher already exists.

      • renamePublisher

        void renamePublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                     String oldname,
                     String newname)
              throws PublisherExistsException,
                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        Renames a publisher.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        oldname - name
        newname - name
        Throws:
        PublisherExistsException - if publisher already exists.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher

      • changePublisher

        void changePublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                     String name,
                     BasePublisher publisher)
              throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Updates publisher data.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of admin.
        name - the name of the publisher to change.
        publisher - the publisher to be added.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • removePublisher

        void removePublisher​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                     String name)
              throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                     ReferencesToItemExistException
        Removes a publisher. References to the publisher from CA, certificate profiles and Multi Group Publishers are checked.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of admin.
        name - the name of the publisher to remove.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publisher
        ReferencesToItemExistException - if references exist from other items in the database.

      • storeCertificate

        boolean storeCertificate​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                         Collection<Integer> publisherids,
                         CertificateDataWrapper certWrapper,
                         String password,
                         String userDN,
                         ExtendedInformation extendedinformation)
                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Stores the certificate to the given collection of publishers. See BasePublisher class for further documentation about function
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        publisherids - a Collection (Integer) of publisher IDs.
        certWrapper - cart
        password - pwd
        userDN - dn
        extendedinformation - info
        Returns:
        true if successful result on all given publishers, if the publisher is configured to not publish the certificate (for example publishing an active certificate when the publisher only publishes revoked), true is still returned because the publishing operation succeeded even though the publisher did not publish the certificate.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if access is denied to the CA issuing incert
        See Also:
        BasePublisher

      • storeCertificate

        boolean storeCertificate​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                         Collection<Integer> publisherids,
                         String fingerprint,
                         String password,
                         String userDN,
                         ExtendedInformation extendedinformation)
                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Performs the same operation as the other storeCertificate method in this class, but performs a lookup for a CertificateData and Base64CertData object. To avoid unnecessary database lookups, only use this method where the CertificateData object isn't immediately available.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        publisherids - ID
        fingerprint - fp
        password - pwd
        userDN - DN
        extendedinformation - info
        Returns:
        bool
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • storeCRL

        boolean storeCRL​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                 Collection<Integer> publisherids,
                 byte[] incrl,
                 String cafp,
                 int number,
                 String issuerDn)
          throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Stores the CRL to the given collection of publishers. See BasePublisher class for further documentation about function
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        publisherids - a Collection (Integer) of publisherids.
        incrl - crl
        cafp - fp
        number - num
        issuerDn - the issuer of this CRL
        Returns:
        true if successful result on all given publishers
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if access was denied to the CA matching userDN
        See Also:
        BasePublisher
